review_data.title: Barchef
review_data.content: Unfreundlicher geht nicht ! Der Barchef ist an Unfreundlichkeit nicht zu überbieten ! Der Deutsche hat seinen Job verfehlt !

review_data.title: delicious food and great service
review_data.content: Our waiter, Raffael, was great, food was delicious but pricey. Carrot Orange soup, USD 15.00, 14 cheese ravioli USD28.00 and carrot cake USD 5.00. but eating in Switzerland is expensive, so take that into consideration.

review_data.title: Em estado de necessidade, vc pode usar, mas vai custar caro.
review_data.content: Um restaurante péssimo para quem aprecia - não um bom papo (porque isso depende da companhia e não do restaurante)...More

review_data.title: went in for a snack and got much more than expected
review_data.content: Food was a surprise. I expected a quick snack and usual pub grub. This was better than I was expecting as was the service.

review_data.title: Will never go back
review_data.content: Today we have been at this restaurant before a concert. After having been sitting there for about 20 minutes and no one coming to ask if we wanted to eat or drink something while 3 people seemed to be (lost and) busy at the bar,...More

review_data.title: Great atmosphere
review_data.content: I enjoyed this bar, staying in the Sheraton. The staff were friendly and the food and drink were excellent.

review_data.title: Friendly female bartender
review_data.content: The Nuovo Café and Bar is locate adjacent to the Sheraton Hotel Zuri-West lobby. The café can be easily accessed with public transit Tram #4 (Toni Areal). There is a nice sidewalk and outdoor patio seating area. Inside, there are comfortable padded lounge chairs, high...More

review_data.title: Not a great view, but food ok
review_data.content: Weird location with tramlines within 20m and two overhead train lines. Staff seemed a bit grumpy, but food fine. Not a very extensive menu though.

review_data.title: Nice Liquor Collection & Good Food
review_data.content: Nuovo has excellent collection of Liquor. Apart from drinks, Pizza and Pasta at this restaurant are really good.

review_data.title: Super Drinks und super Bedienung
review_data.content: Sehr modern, geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Preise Zürich level, also eher hoch. Angenehme Hintergrundmusik, Hotel Sheraton im gleichen Gebäude, kann ich empfehlen....More

review_data.title: Decent Food and Prices
review_data.content: Ate here one night after finishing business on the late side. Good selection of things to eat. Great Beer. quick service. Comfy chairs. Zurich is generally very expensive and this place was no more costly than anywhere else

review_data.title: Great pasta
review_data.content: The hotel bar offers also a small italian menu if you feel like skipping the restaurant and at better pricing I went for "build your own pasta" where you can choose the pasta, sauce and three toppings That turned out to be a good choice...More

review_data.title: Tasty burgers and great service!
review_data.content: We had a brief lunch at Cafe&Bar Nuovo, angus beef burgers and a local tap beer. The burgers were delicious! The service was fast and very friendly. A very good choice.

review_data.title: Great cocktails
review_data.content: The drinks here are somewhat on the expensive side but certainly pack a punch. Worth a visit especially if you're staying in house. The pasta dishes on the bar menu are also excellent.

review_data.title: Stale environment, obnoxious guests
review_data.content: This bar is nothing special. It is just like any other hotel bar. The service was fine. The other patrons though were VERY obnoxious, drunk, and had clearly been over-served. This made for a very annoying experience here. There are much better places to spend...More
